events.message: Customer submitted initial claim reporting a car collision that occurred two days ago on the highway at dusk.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of initial details mentioning vehicle collision with a tree.
An agent with expertise in vehicle accident claims was assigned promptly to handle the case and guide the customer.
The customer was informed that their claim for the car accident was officially acknowledged and under review.
Request sent to customer for accident photos, police report, and vehicle repair estimates to proceed with claim.
Customer uploaded all required documents, including police report and photos showing the extent of the vehicle damage.
Investigation team initiated a thorough review of submitted evidence and contacted the repair shop for damage assessment.
Investigation concluded confirming the collision details matched the claim; repair estimates verified as accurate.
A settlement offer covering the full estimated repair costs was proposed to the customer for approval.
Customer responded positively, agreeing to the settlement amount and expressing satisfaction with the claims process.
Claim officially approved by the claims department after customer acceptance of settlement offer.
Settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account without delay.
The auto accident claim has been formally closed following full settlement and customer confirmation.
All claim files and correspondence have been archived in the system for future reference as per company policy.
